messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Do you want a local voice speaking for you at Westminster? I was born and educated in Hillingdon and have lived and worked here for almost all my adult life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with a plan to spend at home.

mentions.candidate: I am one of you, not a career politician.

issues.education: We want to invest in our children's futures via Grammar Schools and vocational training and put local people first for housing and jobs.

housing.content: We want to invest in our children's futures via Grammar Schools and vocational training and put local people first for housing and jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am one of you, not a career politician.

images.caption: CLIFF DIXON in Hayes & Harlington Standing Up for Real Change
